name: Nom Nom Cozy Forest Cafe
storyline: Is a game where you can unleash your creativity by creating beverages and snacks for the animals that visit your forest cafeteria. You can befriend the animals that visit your cafeteria and learn more recipes along the way. You can even make some custom designs for your creations! Decorate the place, prepare your beverages and snacks to the rhythm of cheerful music, and snap pictures for your cafeteria website!
summary:
"Ever wanted to escape the frenzy of city life? Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxed decoration and rhythm game where you manage a cafeteria and befriend cute animals.
Prepare your dishes to the beat of catchy tunes and explore creativity through design in this low-stress experience, creating delightful snacks and beverages.
Form friendships with the customers to unlock new foods and decoration items, and build the cozy forest café of your dreams."
